title: Grit: the power of passion and perseverance | Angela Lee Duckworth
description: Leaving a high-flying job in consulting, Angela Lee Duckworth took a job teaching math to seventh graders in a New York public school. She quickly realized that IQ wasn't the only thing separating the successful students from those who struggled. Here, she explains her theory of Grit as a predictor of success.

tracksList.transcript: I left a very demanding job in management consulting
tracksList.translate: من یک شغل بسیار پرمشغله و چالش‌ برانگیز در زمینه مشاوره مدیریت را ترک کردم

tracksList.transcript: for a job that was even more demanding teaching!
tracksList.translate: برای یک شغل که حتی پرمشغله‌تر و چالش‌برانگیزتر بود: تدریس

tracksList.transcript: I went to teach seventh graders math
tracksList.translate: من برای تدریس ریاضی به دانش‌آموزان کلاس هفتم رفتم

tracksList.transcript: in the New York City public schools.
